p.k: 62% Fantasy adventure with Roberto Benigni, a dark retelling of the classic tale of a wooden puppet who seeks to become a real boy. Filmed in Italian with subtitles
56% A family of evacuated kids are granted one wish a day by a grouchy sand fairy (voiced by Eddie Izzard). Magical fantasy adventure based on E Nesbit's classic tale
52% A young girl visiting her grandad in Montana rescues an injured wild dog and trains him for a sled race. Family adventure starring Christopher Lloyd
65% Sonic has settled into his home on Earth - but trouble strikes when he accidentally knocks out the power grid and gives an evil genius a bad idea
77% A lovelorn shop boy sets out to capture a falling star, but hasn't reckoned on sky captain Robert De Niro or wicked witch Michelle Pfeiffer. Fantasy

p.n: The Mummy: Tomb Of The Dragon Emperor
p.k: 54% Adventurer Brendan Fraser goes head-to-head with undead Emperor Jet Li and an army of terracotta warriors. Contains moderate fantasy violence/flashing images
65% Sonic has settled into his home on Earth - but trouble strikes when he accidentally knocks out the power grid and gives an evil genius a bad idea
77% A lovelorn shop boy sets out to capture a falling star, but hasn't reckoned on sky captain Robert De Niro or wicked witch Michelle Pfeiffer. Fantasy
